Dialogue.Value: It’s a couch for NetAgents who,just need to take a break.
....Somehow，they’re even less,comfortable than the chairs in,the lobby.
Is it some sort of productivity,trick? Maybe management,doesn’t like long breaks.
It’s a couch for NetAgents who,just need to take a break.
....Somehow，they’re even less,comfortable than the chairs in,the lobby.
Is it some sort of productivity,trick? Maybe management,doesn’t like long breaks.
It’s one of those fancy vending,machines that uses a platform,to deliver your item to the slot.
It’s full of lunch foods and bread，,for the working NetAgent.
Hey，I was standing right in the,hallway waiting for you! Let me,walk you in and we can start!
Hey，I was standing right in the,hallway waiting for you! Let me,walk you in and we can start!
Are you the Alice that Agent,Yagokoro has mentioned in,her reports?
What’s a normal-looking girl,doing around all these,NetAgents，you ask?
A plainclothes operation’s,coming up. Can’t tip off the,perps before we strike.
We can start the meeting now,that you’re here.
I’m not on a mission right now，,so I’m just tidying the place up.
Peaceful times like this are hard,to come by.
